resources:
AiOhTea Collection Setup device... Button ADD SWITCH
1.Enter ID and Description of a switch that will be/was attached to network\n 2.Press ADD SWITCH button to add the switch to your device collection.
Switch Description Such as \"Irrigation system\" Switch Name About... IoT should make our life easy and enjoyable\n like having tea. Processing..., please wait!
SWITCH STATUS</!--> "Status: ON" "Status: OFF" "Status: OFFLINE" "Tap to find the switch"
SWITCH CONTROL MESSAGES</!--> "Successfully establishing connection" "Error in establishing connection" "Listening switch's status" "Error in listening switch" "Command was sent" "Command was sent" "Switch offline, could not send command"
SWITCH SETUP</!--> Should be an easy to remember name WiFi access point name where the switch will connect to WiFi password to access to WiFi access point
SETUP SWITCH WiFi SSID WiFi password Add new switch to device list can not be empty.
